column1: in memory ofmary weeks 1944 - 2015 | mary weeks
column6: 2015 at morris county hospital. she was born october 8
column9: the daughter of william and veronica weeks
column13: josephine. mary had worked as a dishwasher at the hays house and the nursing home. she is survived by her son
column17: of sedan; 6 grandchildren and 9 great-grandchildren. mary requested to be cremated and asked that no services be held. memorial contributions may be made at farmers & drovers bank
